title: Georgian marriage and food in history
itunes:title: Georgian marriage and food in history
itunes:subtitle: Lesley Adkins discusses the realities of marriage in Georgian Britain, while Sarah Pennell explores changing attitudes to food in the early modern period. Matt Elton presents
